name: Arcanine
flavorText:
A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.

previous.name: Growlithe
previous.flavorText:
Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

next.name: Poliwag
next.flavorText:
Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.
